name: Authentic Italian Rice Pudding
author: Cooking Italian With Joe
summary: Let Cooking Italian with Joe show you how to make my grandmother's authentic Italian world's best rice pudding! Truly smooth and silky texture that fills your taste buds with yum. Garnish with chopped nuts, cinnamon, and whipped cream.
directions: Mix milk, rice, 1/2 of the sugar, vanilla extract, and salt together in a saucepan over medium-high heat
Blend remaining sugar with whole eggs and yolks in a bowl to make a creamy custard
Reduce heat of the milk mixture
Let simmer, uncovered, until thickened, 30 to 40 minutes
Heat until thickened again, about 5 minutes more
Beat cream in a chilled glass or metal bowl with an electric mixer until soft peaks form
Remove the milk and custard mixture from heat
Pour pudding into a serving dish, cover, and refrigerate until chilled, at least 2 hours
